Reference

Load nflverse data

load_pbp()

Load Play By Play

load_player_stats()

Load Player Level Weekly Stats

load_rosters()

Load Rosters

load_teams()

Load NFL Team Graphics, Colors, and Logos

load_schedules()

Load Game/Schedule Data

load_trades()

Load Trades

load_draft_picks()

Load Draft Picks from PFR

load_combine()

Load Combine Data from PFR

load_nextgen_stats()

Load Player Level Weekly NFL Next Gen Stats

load_depth_charts()

Load Weekly Depth Charts

load_injuries()

Load Injury Reports

load_espn_qbr()

Load ESPN's QBR

load_pfr_passing()

Load Advanced Passing Stats from PFR

load_snap_counts()

Load Snap Counts from PFR

Load ffverse data

load_ff_playerids()

Load Fantasy Player IDs

load_ff_rankings()

Load Latest FantasyPros Rankings

Loading raw data

qs_from_url()

Load .qs file from a remote connection

csv_from_url()

Load .csv / .csv.gz file from a remote connection

Load .rds file from a remote connection

raw_from_url()

Load raw filedata from a remote connection

Progressively
